website_summaries.verdict: A quality Christmas-themed train set with a robust construction that will continue to delight little Mickey Mouse fans well beyond the festive season.
pros: Large size and solid build provide enhanced durability, even at the hands of enthusiastic children
Features three cars and an engine with working headlight and Mickey as conductor
Realistic train sounds, voice clips, and attention to detail bring this set to life
cons: Heavy engine may require more batteries than some toy train sets

customer_reviews.title: One set works fine the other set never worked it stop and wont ...
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying train set in October not realizing when opened in December if there was a problem it was to late to return. I thought we had 90 days. I bought two train sets for two of my grandchildren. One set works fine the other set never worked it stop and wont run we have tried two sets of new batteries but it doesn't help. I went to do a return and it said it was to late. i tried to find a contact to see if I could get an exchange and there is no way to contact anyone so we wasted money. I would say be careful its hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: pab

customer_reviews.title: Constantly derails
customer_reviews.text: Set this up around my tree and it doesn't go long before it derails. You can't leave it in the on position because it'll continue to keep. So when you are about to stop playing it, you have to make sure the train is within arms reach so you can turn the switch to the off position. Was excited about this train, but overall very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: christt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome train set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. I love it. We also have the Lionel Coca Cola one that we bought in 2015. Between the two I prefer this one. It's cheaper and faster. The sounds are clearer and the additional tracks are much cheaper too. These tracks are also easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: debbie le

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: this train is adorable. both my three year old and my 9 month old love it. the track was easy to put together. we had it in a circle under our Christmas tree. it has a few sayings, (first stop the north pole, second stop, mickey's house, etc.), and also plays a whistle sound and makes chug chug noises. the controls are easy to use - my three year old got it right away and was able to control it herself. also it seems pretty sturdy, both kids messed with it for the entire month we had it out, and so far it has come out unscathed.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas tree train!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect train to go around the base of a Christmas tree. The sound effects are really cute, as is the design of each Disney themed car. The train wheels are a bit of a hassle to properly align on the tracks but once it's on correctly the train has no problems! The remote has the option to increase or decrease speed as well as put the train in reverse. Our 4 kids think it's amazing and I have to say, it's magical even for the grown-ups! All aboard the Mickey Express!
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: but the heavier trains do a much better job of staying on the tracks
customer_reviews.text: This train is the second train I've purchased to go around my Christmas tree (not in the same year), and what I've quickly learned is that the more expensive the train the more it weighs. This might seem unimportant at first, but the heavier trains do a much better job of staying on the tracks. This is a decent train if you have low carpet or a hard surface for a floor, but I can see how it wouldn't do as well on thicker carpet or surfaces with more give to them. All in all my 3 year old son really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kit.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with adult play participation.
customer_reviews.text: For 5.5 yo granddaughter. Pros: Easy to setup and use. Excellent sound effects. Deaccelerates to stop, accelerates to speed smoothly. Top speed is slow enough not to derail train. No problems with breakage during play. Requires adult play participation to keep on the rails. Pro? Con? Cons: Challenging for kids to get on track and coupled. Can be challenging for adults! Proprietary track to this set. Can't buy extra Lionel track to expand setup. Kids like to put toy people/animals on the train. Box car doors slide well to allow things to be put inside. It would be nice to have a sided flat car to more easily set toys on.
customer_reviews.author: Topgum

customer_reviews.title: So very cute, but arrived damaged. Cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: Love this train! Still planning on using it, but the packaging was not created well for the type of product this is. It appears the box was smushed in transit and unfortunately there is a chip in Mickey's ear. The train is adorable though and would absolutely purchase another set for a friend if they update their packaging to ensure that the characters cannot be damaged. After using this for a few days, I am beyond irritated that the train will not stay on the tracks. I would consider another train before purchasing this particular one as it is made with very cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 3yo at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: We rolled it out a couple of weeks before Christmas for everyone to enjoy. Our 3yo was elated. Lots of play time and zero problems. You probably should know a little about model trains though to ensure problem-free use. All the track pieces need to be flat (preferably hard surface), carefully lock them together, ensure every single wheel on each car is properly aligned. We purchased C cell to AA cell adapters to be able to use AA rechargeable batteries in this - works very well and we've had multiple days of playtime without needing a recharge.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to our Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for under MOST Christmas Trees of between 6ft and 9ft. Plenty of track so it doesn't foul on the tree stand. The remote control is excellent, and whilst the track is plastic, it is sturdy and lays flat. I also like the fact you can buy more on Amazon if you need it. Be nice to be able to buy more carriages, but I guess you could mix and match other sets for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brings you back to your youth right away.
customer_reviews.text: At 43 years old, it just doesn't feel like Christmas anymore. I bought this for my two-year old. We opened it on Xmas day and OMG I was back in 1983! Was it the nostalgia of growing up near Disney? The idea of a train around the tree? NO! It was needing three AAA batteries and SIX (YES, THE SAME AMOUNT A PRISON INMATE PLACES IN A SOCK TO TEACH HIS CELLIE A LESSON) C-cell batteries and not a store open in town. I can still hear my Dad cursing the holidays! Thanks, Disney.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 days
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely loved this train! It's nicely made & looks great! It's quite fiddly to get the train cars both on the tracks & connected to each other. I'd say half my time was spent putting the cars back on track. The lights & sounds are terrific & the remote was great. I set it up as a an under-tree Christmas morning surprise. It sat unused for 3 days & it still stopped working in less than a week! Brand new batteries but nothing works. I tried calling Lionel but the wait time was unbearable. Pretty disappointing as my son loved it (for 4 days).
customer_reviews.author: Danrogy

customer_reviews.title: Love this train!
customer_reviews.text: The ease in putting this together and how cute it is. I saw some negative reviews first do not expect a 3 year old to be able to navigate this train alone. This train was easy to put together ran nicely on track at medium to slow speed. I bought a used one i'm sure someone returned it because they left a battery in it. The used one came in original package and it great condition.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work & customer service awful
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time putting together and trying to get to work. Lionel customer service awful they didn’t care it didn’t work. Said contact amazon maybe they will do something, bought it for Christmas, our girls are so sad! Would never purchase their product again as they were not helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Miracle Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice train!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this train for our two year old daughter for Christmas. She was beyond excited. She’s a gentle child so it’s worked out pretty good. She can’t put it on the track herself but she loves using the remote and seeing it run. I’m impressed with the quality and programming. Very slick train. Already purchased some extra track. I recommend this train to all train lovers. Keep in mind it’s not intended for young children, they will need your help.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This train is actually bigger than I thought it would be. I had purchased it for our miniature Christmas town so instead we had to put it around the base of the Christmas tree and it is pretty huge we did not use all of the track pieces. But we actually love it we and the sounds and the lights. It generally stays on the track pretty well and it goes really fast. There are different speeds on the remote control. Its really nice. You’ll have to purchase batteries for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for great grandchildren and put it under my tree. HA HA. I really got it because it took me back to my childhood memories with my brother and dad as a child. Also Disney because I took 3 great grandchildren, granddaughter and daughter there last year. I'm 71 and will cherish this train for all it means to me and how it runs around my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Train!
customer_reviews.text: I love trains and have a lot of American Flyer trains. I wanted a train under the tree for the grand kids. The price for this was great and I had it set up in a matter of 10 minutes. The track goes together great, fit around the bottom of the tree great. Got the batteries and it ran forever! The kids liked it and Grandpa liked it even more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy L

customer_reviews.title: This is a great train set for early school age children
customer_reviews.text: This is a great train set for early school age children. Plastic durable tracks that are easy to set up. There are 3 options: circle oval and large oval, though "circle" pattern causes tracks to lift up so the train cannot ride well on them. Controls are easy to use. My six year old loves to control the train: can adjust speed and go both forward/backwards. Control also has a bell and other sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Simple Train
customer_reviews.text: I love Disney but this train was very frustrating. From day 1 it kept coming off the track. The train only says 2 tiny phrases. and it only has Mickey and. Donald Duck. Everyone loved seeing this train displayed around my tree, but I kept getting embarrassed when I turned it on and it would go around the track once with no problem, and then the carts would fall of the track or just get left behind. This also beat the price of the one at the Disney store for over $300.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Boyce

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT FOR KIDS!
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR MY GRAND NEPHEW FOR HIS BIRTHDAY. HE OF COURSE LOVED IT TO DEATH, HE ACTUALLY CARRIES THE ENGINE WITH HIM WHEREVER HE GOES. LOVES MICKEY! SO I AM GOD NOW, SO IT WAS WELL WORTH THE 100 BUCKS! AND IT IS LIONEL AFTER ALL!
customer_reviews.author: ROLAND JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Having actual smoke come out would have been great. When stopping it does seem to take a ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this train she has wanted one for quite awhile. Having actual smoke come out would have been great. When stopping it does seem to take a few moments for the transmission between control and engine. The hooks between the trains could be a bit better, the slightest bump or hit and they come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: Cute fun train
customer_reviews.text: The quality and presentation matches the price. I'd give this 3.5 stars because of its sub-par function. The train easily comes off the tracks, and the cars unhook too easily as well. Otherwise, this is a super fun and cute product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas decoration
customer_reviews.text: Awesome under the tree decoration for any Disney fan... My dog likes it too so it's fun playing with it with her as it has a remote so I can make it move backwards and forwards and make nosies to play with her.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It definitely was a hit with the kids in the idea of the train. We did have trouble getting the train to stay on track, but that could be because we have carpet. Hopefully it will be a tradition to set it up around the tree though.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Compton

customer_reviews.title: Disney Train
customer_reviews.text: Very nice train for the money. Easy set up and good quality. It's the perfect size to set up under the Christmas tree. Remote with sound whistle and forward/reverse work well. We use it sparingly to save battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Train for Kids - Needs a lot of Juice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent train for our little boy; at 18m he loves being able to push the buttons on this kid-friendly remote. The sounds are great and the light on the engine is a nice addition. The only reason I am giving it 4-stars is because it takes a lot of batteries and they didn't last even the whole month of December using it for maybe 10min every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Finding Deals

customer_reviews.title: My sons loved this! We put it under the Christmas tree ...
customer_reviews.text: My sons loved this! We put it under the Christmas tree and enjoyed it the whole Christmas season.
customer_reviews.author: krudy

customer_reviews.title: Very cool train
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift as was most of the items purchased this past month. Reviews and E-mails about your products need a selection to keep these confidential. We share the same Email and my wife knows everything I purchased for her. NO SURPRISE THIS CHRISTMAS
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great train and value. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this on sale (40% off), and the kids love it. My 5 and 2yo take turns running it around the track and stuffing toys in one of the box cars. It’s a perfect addition under the tree. I do have to help them set up the cars, but the train has not derailed on its own and no issues with the controller as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic train. Good buy when on sale.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Easy setup and easy to use (even for little kids). Does use a lot of batteries but it is what it is. I only wish it said a few more different things when you press the buttons but my 1.5 year old doesn't seem to mind. Goes nicely around a Christmas tree and can be made smaller or larger depending on the shape and size of track you want.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very good present for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my grandson. He loves to play with the train, I have to help him put it on the tracks when it comes off but otherwise he can control the speed and direction of the train. Really is a fun toy and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: David G. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable
customer_reviews.text: Even after trying with three sets of brand new batteries the controller would not pair with the train. This is a problem other people have noted. Also, the train and tracks are VERY cheaply made, I wouldn't expect they would last too long. I am returning this for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Oahu

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pain
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, but not funtional. It constantly derails as connectors between train cars are nearly nonexistent. We can’t even make one fill loop. Also, the fact that you have to turn on/off on both remote control and the train is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jenya

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Love this train I enjoyed watching it go around the tree. Our old one took batteries in the coal trolley rather than the engine now the batteries are in the engine this is a great improvement just wish there was an option for volume on the sound effects.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this train. It’s really great and works really well. I do wish it had Disney music or talking characters. But it is worth it and the size is great for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Brought that wonderful cheer and smile from my Grandson and Kiddos.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect train for the Christmas Tree to bring out the best Christmas Cheers in the Family! Highly recommended for all families with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nice size
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my Mickey village it large size very nice haven’t used it yet as came after Xmas will try it before next year tho .
customer_reviews.author: razorlady

customer_reviews.title: Train cars disconnect very easy going around
customer_reviews.text: Train is nice and has all advertised but the cars come unconnected to easy. Every other time around no matter the speed they come apart.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandson(almost 3 yrs old) loves this train. He is able to work the remote easily, he just needs help getting on the track correctly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Parris

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: The best price: just 4 dollars (because I get approved for Amazon Credit Card). This is the best gift that I ever received. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien J. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers Mistake
customer_reviews.text: My son just opened this on Christmas Day, and it is missing a curved track piece. It had an extra straight piece instead, and there is no configuration to make this work without dirailing the train. So I'm disappointed that he was let down, and can't even enjoy the present we purchased for him.
customer_reviews.author: Traybest

customer_reviews.title: So easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Love this train! The sounds are great and it is sooo easy to operate! This is a great train that I would recommend highly and I did look at many trains before I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Penman

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on track
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this was perfect except that it does not stay on the track. It is very difficult to get it lined up properly. Almost impossible for my 4 year old to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Canafax

customer_reviews.title: High quality toy train
customer_reviews.text: High quality toy train, it’s been a lot of fun! It makes cool train noises and has button options to make it whistle or ring a bell or have the conductor say things and can go forward or backward...only problem is there is no silent or volume down option, and I wish there was! After 30 mins of kids playing with it the noises start to get to me 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jared W Collings

customer_reviews.title: The train is pretty cute - so cute that kids want to touch ...
customer_reviews.text: The train is pretty cute - so cute that kids want to touch it. But oh boy when they do the trains come apart and fall off of the tracks. But wait....aren't kids supposed to touch this? And seriously I knocked it off the track so easily and it's pretty difficult to keep the trains connected. Very very frustrating. Only buy it if no one will ever touch it once you've put it together.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Good Lionel train..
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed.. the detail is really good and the price is non-contest. Son loves this one with all the bells and whistles (pun intended). It is a monsters train too. On the smallest layout configuration, it is still bigger than the diameter of my 7' tall tree. DAMN !
customer_reviews.author: Omar Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun - easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 21 year-old son with Autism who loves trains and all things Disney - he loves this train! He set it all up himself and loves the remote control. Great train sounds, horns, and a hoot to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Scot J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love Mickey!
customer_reviews.text: This train is so cute! My only complaint is that it goes off the track a little too easily, but I also have a 2 and 4 year old who never want to back up and think they can lightly touch it when it goes by, so this problem will probably subside in a couple more years.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!!! Engine had short!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy was so happy til the engine wouldn't run ... we tried a whole package of batteries. But there seems to be a short :( unfortunately I bought this early for a Christmas gift but i would never recommend buying it for anyone as it was just a waste of money now that nothing can be done about the engine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B Tarver

customer_reviews.title: All the bells and whistles, great train!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Train sounds really nice, remote works well, engine moving parts simulate real locomotives. We love it. Looked great around our Christmas tree. The headlight is especially bright. We enjoyed that the train changes boarding messages while running because you can simulate needing to stop at mickey's house and the north pole.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality for a toy that is played with often.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we expected to receive. It’s the 3rd of this scale Lionel train we’ve bought over the years for our son. He has autism and can be rough in on his toys. These hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: JenC

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: DIDN'T WORK OUT OF THE BOX. I SHOULD HAVE LISTENED TO THE ONE STAR REVIEWS. PLASTIC MADE IN CHINA JUNK. THE TRACKS AND TRAINS ARE THIN PLASTIC. TERRIBLE THAT LIONEL PUTS ITS NAME ON IT. MY THREE YEAR OLD WAS SO UPSET. MERRY CHRISTMAS JUNK MANUFACTURE.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat Lionel Trains!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally magical! My 2 year old grandson was thrilled with his Mickey and Friends Christmas Train! His Daddy sat it up for the entire month of December for him to enjoy every afternoon! It ran like a charm and they will have it for many years to come! Lionel trains are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bling Blinky of TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Great, but loud.
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a really nice train. Unfortunately, it's the loudest train I've ever heard and there's no volume options. If you want this to run around your tree like we did, be prepared to listen to it. We returned it strictly based off of the sound. It's also fairly large.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Vodron

customer_reviews.title: Five year old grandson delighted with his Christmas train
customer_reviews.text: Five year old grandson delighted with his Christmas train! Loves the train whistle and chugging sound, As well as the headlight and cheerful announcements by the conductor. Many delightful exclamations while playing with this train.
customer_reviews.author: MDexter

customer_reviews.title: Love this train
customer_reviews.text: Love this train! It is very sturdy. Kids can play with it with no worries of it breaking. Highly recommend this train.
customer_reviews.author: kac

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Purchased this battery operated train for my 1 year old who loves Mickey Mouse. It comes with an easy to use controller that has options to make sounds, i.e. Goofy yelling "All aboard." Highly recommend for a house with kids or a starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cresong

customer_reviews.title: Cute train
customer_reviews.text: We got this train for our son for Christmas, it works really well and is super cute. I like that it have a controller for speed and you can also change from from forward to backwards. My only complaint is it does fall off the track and disce4onnect from the other cars very easily. So I felt like we were constantly putting it back together but he stillf787
customer_reviews.author: samantha hardy

customer_reviews.title: Cute for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item for kids. Easy to use. Train has an issue staying on track at times but still great item
customer_reviews.author: Tina T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Train!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect Christmas gift for me two year old. She loves trains and Mickey Mouse. It is a good quality train and the track was easy to assemble. A common gripe among reviewers was the battery power which I agree with but it brought many hours of smiles to my daughters face. It is a bit noisy but what train isnt?
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Great train for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great train set for kids. Easy to assemble. Our 22 month old loves it and always wants it on.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Sound doesn’t turn off, everything else good
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it except you can’t turn the sound off while it’s running which can get annoying when your 2 year old wants it on all day long.
customer_reviews.author: SiFi G

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and appears well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I was expecting. The engine is heavy weight and the cars are very cute. Only down side is that it is hard for a younger child to set the train on the tracks properly--it takes good fine motor skills. Track is also hard for a small child to click together. Once set up, however, it runs like a champ and is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brotherton

customer_reviews.title: Great train with great detail and color!
customer_reviews.text: It is great! My grandson loves it. It has a lot of detail, is durable, and runs well on the tracks. However, it is a detailed train and so care must be taken that the little ones don't just throw it across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Train Ever
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the train to parr with the remote. 3 very disappointed children on Christmas morning. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Train
customer_reviews.text: Very nice train for around the tree. Had lots of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my Grand nephew for Christmas. He still sends me videos and tells me what a great gift it was. It's the gift that keeps on giving.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt S.

customer_reviews.title: Runs well.
customer_reviews.text: Just placed the batteries and had it running so far so good. So it’s not very sturdy it’s plastic. But so far the first day seems to run good and looks good. Hopefully it last and I get my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Jenpen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Was worried after reading the reviews but I’m completely satisfied with this purchase. I feel it’s a good value for the price. I set it up around the bottom of our 7-1/2’ tree on carpet and it hasn’t derailed once even at full speed. My daughter loves the sound effects and Mickey Mouse. Took about 20 minutes to unpack and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Awesome train set
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Awesome works great and packed in a reusable nice box . Assembly was simple and easy was up and running in 20 minutes . Nice Job Lionel .
customer_reviews.author: Bob the builder

customer_reviews.title: Only moved in reverse
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the train would only drive in reverse. Returning for another. Hope The next one works
customer_reviews.author: LC Are

customer_reviews.title: Best train ever
customer_reviews.text: The best train ever, super easy to assemble, the kids loved it so much, i uploaded a video so you can see how great it is.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: keep track perfectly flat or it will topple over if ...
customer_reviews.text: keep track perfectly flat or it will topple over if you go full speed, even so, almost just on outside wheels at full speed! lol
customer_reviews.author: Darren - Long Island

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun at Christmas. Grandkids loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Train
customer_reviews.text: This train is so cute....... very detailed, the Grandchildren just loved it. But I bought it for me ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone.  User friendly controller.
customer_reviews.text: 4 y/o son thought this was the best around the tree this year. Easy controls had him having fun in no time. Assembled in less than 10 minutes for the batteries and track. Fun for all.
customer_reviews.author: thekingdom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun train set. I got this for my husband for Christmas since we just had our first child. This train is great because it is bigger than most train sets. The little Mickey and Donald are so cute. The train doesn't come derailed like I've noticed with other trains.
customer_reviews.author: skyelar Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A little louder than I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A little louder than I wanted. I was surprised by the size as well. The train was bigger than I expected. Kids loved this on christmas morning. I’m planning on getting more tracks For next tear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Buy it... you will love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great train set! My 3 year old grandson loves this train. You can’t go wrong purchasing this set!
customer_reviews.author: DR in MO

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Mickeys nose is missing on the front of the train
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cool for around our Christmas tree. Kids play with it more than they did our previous train.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's not that easy to assemble the trains 🚂 with one another. But it's a cute train.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and well-built play train set
customer_reviews.text: Lionel knows how to make great play train sets. We purchased this Disney Christmas' train set for our son and everybody at home loved it. It is well built, easy to assemble and we love the fact that we can purchase additional train carts and rails to customize it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby AR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mickey Train
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect train!!! My boyfriend had a Mickey Mouse Tree, skirt and ornaments and I bought him the Mickey Mouse Train!!! A Great Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hida

customer_reviews.title: Awesome train
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use our 1 year old granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mickey Mouse Train
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this train. The construction is heavy duty and tough, great for our youngest. My only complaint is the sound of the train announcements was a random male voice and not Mickey or another Disney character.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great Choo Choo Train.
customer_reviews.text: Got this train for Christmas to go around the Christmas tree. I like that it has a remote so that I don't have to keep bending down under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Choo Choo!  You will love this
customer_reviews.text: Loved it from the first time we set it up under the Christmas tree! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool train
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like : Disney & Lionel. Quality seems very good
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Bostwick

customer_reviews.title: It fit great under our tree
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for. It fit great under our tree, and our 3 year old loves to play with it. Stays on track under normal use with no problem. We even set it up on carpet, and it still stable. Battery consumption seems to be good...playing with it for a month on the same batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Xmas toy or decoration
customer_reviews.text: Train comes off the tracks a lot, makes a nice Xmas toy or decoration.
customer_reviews.author: I.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great train, quality and cuteness
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this train. It is her favorite to see the characters go around. Great quality and beautiful gift.
customer_reviews.author: dominique

customer_reviews.title: Great train for a toddler, Mickey lover
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and simple enough for my 2 year old to enjoy driving it around the track. Only dislike is cars can become separated easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Nelson

customer_reviews.title: You and your little one will be thrilled with this Disney train
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Disney train! Three year old mastered use of remote control within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Avery

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to assemble and easy enough to operate for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Cute train, but a pain to align on the tracks
customer_reviews.text: Train is magical and charming, but very difficult for my husband and myself to get it set appropriately ON the tracks. Without question, our son can’t do it. And it takes us repeated attempts to get the wheels properly aligned. I understand it is durable plastic, but it shouldn’t be this hard to align a Lionel train on its track.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: The train is beautiful the problem is that it keeps fallen apart and ...
customer_reviews.text: The train is beautiful the problem is that it keeps fallen apart and you have to come and put it back together

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect quality
customer_reviews.text: Baught for my 2 year old daughter the detail of the train and characters is nice. Easy to setup and operate For 2 year old but seems cheaply made. The quality isn't there. But for first train around Christmas tree for kid is great. Would have given five stars if quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: justin titus

customer_reviews.title: fun train to put around the chirstmas tree but has issues
customer_reviews.text: my son went nutz when i put this around the tree. he loved it. it has nice sounds and the look of it is really nice. but the problem is that it keeps derailing and keeping the train on the tracks is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Hidalgo

product_meta.title: Lionel Disney Mickey Mouse Express Battery-powered Model Train Set Ready to Play w/ Remote
product_meta.description: Size:Complete SetAll aboard the Mickey Mouse Express! Help with Mickey’s special delivery and join Mickey, Minnie, Donald Duck and Goofy spread the Christmas spirit in this present filled Disney set! Bring a dose of holiday cheer to your track layout with these iconic characters dressed in their Christmas best!With this Ready-to-Play set comes an exclusive track system which allows you to create; a circle, a rectangle or an oval layout. As this track system is exclusive to Ready-to-Play set, it is not compatible with Lionel G Gauge or other G Gauge track systems.
feature_bullets: Set Includes: Battery-powered General-style locomotive driven by Mickey, Present filled tender with Donald Duck, Boxcar, Center-cupola caboose, 24 curved and 8 straight plastic track pieces, RC remote control

Locomotive Features: Highly detailed, sturdily constructed, General-style locomotive, Authentic train sounds, including bell and whistle, Working headlight, Requires six C cell batteries (not included)
Freight Car Features: Fixed knuckle couplers, Opening doors on boxcar

Remote Control Features: Designed for easy use, Clearly marked buttons release Disney specific announcements, allow train to go forward and reverse, sound the whistle, and ring the bell, Requires three AAA batteries (not included)
Ready-to-Play | Set Length: 50" x 73" | Recommended Age: 4 years +

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars532 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
